selection.title: Choose a character
selection.subtitle: Each one has their own commands, sensors and goals.
selection.challengeBeingCreated: You already have a challenge in progress. You can choose to continue editing or to discard it
selection.discardWarning: Careful! If you discard your challenge you won't be able to recover it!
selection.name: Name
selection.creator: create your own challenge

Lita.name: Lita
Lita.personality: Cheerful (you will always see her smiling!).
Lita.curiousFact: She has her own orchard and likes to encase herself in her shell, like a ball.

Duba.name: Duba
Duba.personality: Hungry (it's always a great time to eat!).
Duba.curiousFact: Her favorite dish is beefsteak and she loves to make "asados".

Yvoty.name: Yvoty
Yvoty.personality: Creative. Unprejudiced (she doesn't mind what people think!).
Yvoty.curiousFact: Yvoty means "flower" in the Guaraní language and is pronounced "ivotí", with the stress on the last "i". But it is written with two "y"!

Manic.name: Mañic
Manic.personality: Curious. Active. Agile (she never forgets her inline skates!).
Manic.curiousFact: Her grandmother from Formosa (Argentina) gave her the name, which literally means "ñandú" in the Qom language.

Capy.name: Capy y Guyrá
Capy.definition: the capybara and the cattle tyrant
Capy.curiousFact: Their names Capy (from "capybara" which means "lord of the grass") and Guyrá (means "bird"), are from the Tupi Guaraní language.

Chuy.name: Chuy
Chuy.personality: Generose. Sportsperson (they love to climb sea cliffs!).
Chuy.curiousFact: Their name comes from "chuy chuy" which means "cold" in the Mapuche language.

editor.serverError: There's a problem with the server, try again later
editor.loginWarning: You need to be logged in to share a challenge via url.

toolbox.categoriesHint: When you want to use procedures there should always be categories
